channel.title: natural experiment on Yixin Liu
channel.description: Recent content in natural experiment on Yixin Liu

item.title: All hands on deck: The role of collaborative platforms and lead organizations in achieving environmental goals
item.description: This paper combines the difference-in-differences (DiD) methods and content analysis to examine the effectiveness of collaborative platforms in supporting local collaborations for natural resource management.

item.title: The “watershed” of collaboration: The impact of legislation and collective actions on environmental outcomes
item.description: This paper combines the difference-in-differences (DiD) methods and content analysis to examine the effectiveness of collaborative platforms in supporting local collaborations for natural resource management.

item.title: The effectiveness of network administrative organizations in governing inter-jurisdictional natural resources
item.description: This paper uses the synthetic control method, incorporating monthly water quality data from 14 river monitoring sites in two neighboring cities, to examine the effectiveness of the Network Administrative Organization (NAO) model in reducing water pollution.
